description:
Datomic is a distributed database designed to enable scalable, flexible and intelligent applications, running on next-generation cloud architectures.

Datomic Free is suitable for open-source projects requiring distribution, but is limited to 2 simultaneous peers and transactor-local storage only.

You can download Datomic Console http://docs.datomic.com/console.html by registering here: https://my.datomic.com/downloads/console?requires=account.
summary: Datomic - The fully transactional, cloud-ready, immutable database
author: Cognitect
